comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: A photo of Herman Fisher, apparently murdered by Edgar Murphy in July 1914. The motivation for the murder was reportedly Murphy's jealousy concerning Fisher's relationship with Miss Ida Wilhelm. (See also State v. Murphy, 87 N.J.L. 515, 94 A. 640 (E. & A. 1915)). Photos of Murphy and Wilhelm are also included in this group of Bain LOC photos. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5715529129/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5715528999/in/photostream/] query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50C1EFB385A12738... CONFESSES FISHER MURDER Edgar Murphy, Who Reported Finding the Body, Was Jealous. New York Times July 15, 1914 MOUNT HOLLY, N.J., July 14. - A complete confession of the murder of Herman Fisher near the home of his sweetheart, Ida Wilhelm, at New Albany, on Saturday night, has been made by Edgar Murphy, who was arrested yesterday afternoon.

comment.author: 60458087@N03
comment._content: I love the hardness in this image, there is not a single part of the image that seems muddy, The black in the image is so clear and clean.
